name: Be Mandy's Things
description:
A match 3 game using the beautiful creations of @bemandythings

https://bemandythings.mailchimpsites.com/

Match 3 like bags / creations either horizontally or vertically and receive points. The more points you earn, the more stars you'll receive per level. Getting a match next to any scissor bomb will increase the number of matched bags and earn you more points!

The counter on the left will tell you which bags to match for the level.

At the end of the level you get stars depending on how well you did.

The more stars you earn, the Those stars you use to unlock new levels to make it to the end of the game. If you get stuck, use the shuffle to re-mix the board to keep trying for matches.

Have fun and remember: happiness is a fully loaded bobbin!
